stages.name: Bismillah
stages.english: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful

stages.name: Verse 1
stages.english: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of mankind
stages.instruction: Seek protection with the Lord of mankind

stages.name: Verse 2
stages.instruction: Acknowledge Allah as the King of mankind

stages.name: Verse 3
stages.instruction: Acknowledge Allah as the God of mankind

stages.name: Verse 4
stages.english: From the evil of the retreating whisperer

stages.name: Verse 5
stages.english: Who whispers into the breasts of mankind
stages.instruction: Identify the source of evil whispers

stages.name: Verse 6
stages.english: From among the jinn and mankind
stages.instruction: Acknowledge the sources of whispers from both jinn and mankind
